definition: sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

sentences.english: Common side effects from these drugs include muscle pain and soreness.
sentences.chinese: 这些药物常见的副作用包括肌肉疼痛和酸痛。

sentences.english: My beard and clothes are crusted with sand, my body is sore and aching.
sentences.chinese: 我的胡须和衣服上都是沙子，我的浑身酸痛。

sentences.english: Alleviate various muscles to ache and muscle spasm.
sentences.chinese: 缓解各种肌肉酸痛及肌肉痉挛。

sentences.english: Similarly, bike riders often suffer from shoulder and back injuries and saddle-soreness.
sentences.chinese: 同样的，骑车者也被肩，背部疼痛和氨酸痛所折磨着。

sentences.english: She felt him knead the aching muscles.
sentences.chinese: 她感到他在按摩她酸痛的肌肉。

sentences.english: My muscles are sore from playing baseball.
sentences.chinese: 打完棒球后，我的肌肉一直酸痛。

sentences.english: The pain in his left foot is accompanied by redness and swelling.
sentences.chinese: 左脚酸痛，并有红肿，中变合击。

sentences.english: After climbing the mountain, he aches.
I feel sore and ache all over.
The muscles in my thighs are sore after climbing that hill.
sentences.chinese: 爬过那座山后我的大腿肌肉酸痛。

sentences.english: If your muscles are still sore after your warm-up, try some easy stretching.
sentences.chinese: 如果热身后肌肉仍然酸痛，试着做些简单伸展。

sentences.english: Many people use FIR heat as a successful treatment for arthritis, muscle spasms and rheumatism.
sentences.chinese: 许多人利用远红外线成功的缓解腰腿关节的酸痛。

sentences.english: Aching pain that begins around your navel and often shifts to your lower right abdomen
sentences.chinese: 肚脐周围的酸痛，以及疼痛向右下腹的转移。

sentences.english: Strong thump massage function penetration muscle tissue, effectively relieve pain.
sentences.chinese: 强劲的捶击按摩功能渗透肌肉组织，有效地减轻酸痛。

sentences.english: I should be a mass of aching muscle, unable to move.
sentences.chinese: 我应该肌肉酸痛到甚至都不能动了。

sentences.english: Just make sure you avoid vigorous activity until the soreness has subsided.
sentences.chinese: 确保避免高强度运动直到酸痛消退。

definition: knee/(Internet slang) to kneel down (in admiration)
